stateDiagram

STARTUP_DELAY

STARTUP_DELAY : STARTUP_DELAY

state ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(INIT_CHOICE) <>

HELD_AT_START

HELD_AT_START : HELD_AT_START

HELD_AT_START : enter / #123; output_press = true#59; #125;

HELD_AT_START : 1. do / #123; t2_ms = 0#59; #125;

RELEASED_DEBOUNCE

RELEASED_DEBOUNCE : RELEASED_DEBOUNCE

RELEASED_DEBOUNCE : enter / #123; output_release_event = true#59; #125;

RELEASED_DEBOUNCE : enter / #123; output_press = false#59; #125;

state RELEASED_STABLE {

        SEQUENCE

        SEQUENCE : SEQUENCE

        SEQUENCE_END

        SEQUENCE_END : SEQUENCE_END

        SEQUENCE_END : enter [press_count > 0] / #123; output_seq_end_event = true#59; #125;

        state "$initial_state" as RELEASED_STABLE.(InitialState)

}

PRESSED_DEBOUNCE

PRESSED_DEBOUNCE : PRESSED_DEBOUNCE

PRESSED_DEBOUNCE : enter / #123; press_count++#59; #125;

PRESSED_DEBOUNCE : enter / #123; output_press_event = true#59; #125;

PRESSED_DEBOUNCE : enter / #123; output_press = true#59; #125;

state PRESSED_STABLE {

        state "$initial_state" as PRESSED_STABLE.(InitialState)

        CONFIRM_LONG

        CONFIRM_LONG : CONFIRM_LONG

        state PRESSED_LONG {

                NO_REPEAT

                NO_REPEAT : NO_REPEAT

                DELAY_1ST_REPEAT

                DELAY_1ST_REPEAT : DELAY_1ST_REPEAT

                DELAY_1ST_REPEAT : enter / #123; t2_ms = 0#59; #125;

                PRESSED_REPEAT

                PRESSED_REPEAT : PRESSED_REPEAT

                PRESSED_REPEAT : enter / #123; t2_ms = 0#59; #125;

                PRESSED_REPEAT : enter / #123; output_repeat_event = true#59; #125;

                state "$initial_state" as PRESSED_LONG.(InitialState)

        }

}

state "$initial_state" as ROOT.(InitialState)

STARTUP_DELAY --> ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(INIT_CHOICE) : do [t2_ms > 25]

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(INIT_CHOICE) --> HELD_AT_START : [input_active]

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(INIT_CHOICE) --> RELEASED_STABLE : else

HELD_AT_START --> RELEASED_DEBOUNCE : do [! input_active]

RELEASED_DEBOUNCE --> RELEASED_STABLE : do [t2_ms > 50]

RELEASED_STABLE --> PRESSED_DEBOUNCE : do [input_active]

SEQUENCE --> SEQUENCE_END : do [t2_ms > 500]

RELEASED_STABLE.(InitialState) --> SEQUENCE

PRESSED_DEBOUNCE --> PRESSED_STABLE : do [t1_ms > 50]

PRESSED_STABLE --> RELEASED_DEBOUNCE : do [! input_active]

PRESSED_STABLE.(InitialState) --> CONFIRM_LONG

CONFIRM_LONG --> PRESSED_LONG : do [t1_ms > 500]

DELAY_1ST_REPEAT --> PRESSED_REPEAT : do [t2_ms > 350]

PRESSED_REPEAT --> PRESSED_REPEAT : do [t2_ms > REPEAT_INTERVAL_MS]

PRESSED_REPEAT --> NO_REPEAT : 1. do [disable_repeat]

PRESSED_LONG.(InitialState) --> DELAY_1ST_REPEAT : else

PRESSED_LONG.(InitialState) --> NO_REPEAT : [disable_repeat]

ROOT.(InitialState) --> STARTUP_DELAY
Events
settings
